text: Egha a ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “O nguazir kamɨn gumazim, nɨ bizir kamɨn ganiz, o? Judan ikɨzim, arazir bar kurar kɨ aghuazibagh amuava, Israelɨn nguazim bar an gumazamizir igharaziba bar men apanim gami. Men arazir kurar kamɨn, me ghaze, kɨ ti pura bizim, egha na dɨpova arazir bar mɨzɨrɨzibar na gami. Ezɨ nɨ oragh! Me amir arazir kurar kaba na gamizɨ kɨ bar men anɨngaghe.
